That sounds like something that would make me kick my computer to death out of rage. That or die of alcohol poisoning as I drink to suppress the rage.

I find it hard to laugh at conservative fuck heads because they all too frequently present themselves as capitalists or libertarians, which I am, while advocating policies I find morally repugnant so to me they feel more like an insult than free comedy.

topics.body:
I am going to genetically modify some of my sperm so that it contains Neanderthal DNA, and then impregnate my hypothetical future girlfriend with it. We would have to abort it before a certain time due to laws, but it would be a damn interesting science project.

All I need is to age a bit and actually get a girlfriend.
